article_title: Why Erasing Hamilton From The $10 Bill Is Erasing Our History

article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes

og.description: THE TREASURY DEPARTMENT SCHEME to take the image of Alexander Hamilton off the $10 bill is outrageous. This is not a long-overdue move to honor one of the great women in our history. As we touch on below, that could easily be done (and should be done) with the $20 bill. It is, [...]
